title: Constant lag
body: I was playing lol, everthing was running normal like always. The next day i get on league and i get constant lag spikes on every single game, and its really annoying, and makes the game unplayable, like every 5-10 there is a lag spike. I tried lowering the graphic settings and i still get the same lag. I check my internet connection and its fine. Every single day lol has been laggy on every game i play. please help me with this problem,Thank you.

replies.body: It sounds like you might be experiencing packet loss.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) so we can get an overview of your specific case, and let me know what you find.

Packets: Sent = 1196, Received = 1195, Lost = 1 (0% loss)
Approximate round trip times in milli-seconds:
Minimum = 21ms, Maximum = 658ms, Average = 32ms


these where the results, i left it on  about 10 minutes

Oh wow, that 658 is huge!  There might be an issue with routing or a hiccup somewhere causing these delays.  Try the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network while reaching the game server but be sure it's in a custom game for testing.  Let me know if that helps.
I also forgot to mention that the audio completely cuts out when the lag occurs.

If your FPS is dropping suddenly, a way to see if there are programs using up your CPU would be to have **Task Manager** open during a game and end any processes that are using up your CPU. Be careful though, make sure that process isn't important or it may cause problems with your computer until a restart.

If your ping is spiking, wait a while and see if your ping still spikes. Try to restart your router if your ping is still spiking. If nothing works so far, you should contact your ISP and see if your ISP is having any issues. And last of all, if you are connected via Wi-Fi, try to switch to a Ethernet/Wired connection if possible.
